name: Summer Sausage
description:
New

Mac and Linux versions now available alongside a special Holiday Edition!


Description

Immerse yourself in the classic Finnish summer sausage barbecue. Drink beer and grill some sausages while lazying on your lawn chair. Minimum physical effort. Maximum aim skill required.

Summer Sausage was made in a private game jam and has two game modes, a high score table, endless sausages, hungry seagulls and catchy radio music.

Have fun!

Default Controls

Turn Hand Left - Left Arrow
Turn Hand Right - Right Arrow
Throw Sausage - Space
Drink - Up Arrow
Grab a Drink - Down Arrow

Controls can be changed in the "Controls" menu.

Minimum System Requirements

OS - Windows XP SP2, Mac OS X 10.8, Ubuntu 12.04
Graphics card - DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
CPU - SSE2 instruction set support

Support

Having problems? Encountered a bug? You can contact us via teamsaibor@gmail.com.
